description: How Singapore car market defies Keynesian observations, and why Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Motor Mouth: When Economics 101 does not apply to S’pore car market
title_page: Motor Mouth: When Economics 101 does not apply to S’pore car market | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – In any efficient market, prices fall when competition rises. That is the conventional economic theory.
But this theory does not quite apply in the Singapore car market.
